name: CHRONOS (itch) (May)
description:
In this short bullet hell, your problems are the bullets.

This game? It doesn't have a good guy. Or a bad guy. There's only you.

This game is a memory of the past you, a senseless being who wanted to just run away from every problem it saw. You are now reliving it.

...And although you may be seeing this once more, all that is found is lost to time once more.

Credits

Produced by Interstellar Productions (That includes me)

Music by Gargalan (Not affiliated with us)
